resources.string:
This README is written by Mi Yon Kim.

 Create Phone Bill: Create Phone Bill with Phone Call
 		Customer Name: Person whose phone bill we’re modeling
 		Caller: Phone number of caller
 		Callee: Phone number of callee
 		Start: Date and time call began (12-hour time)
 		End: Date and time call ended (12-hour time)

 Pretty Print: Pretty Printer for Phone Bill
 		Customer Name: Person whose phone bill we’re modeling

 Search: Search for Phone Call
 		Customer Name: Person whose phone bill we’re modeling
 		Start: Date and time call began (12-hour time)
 		End: Date and time call ended (12-hour time)

 Date and time should be in the format: mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm
